name: verified-ohmies-backend
description: The backend infrastructure for Verified Ohmies

scripts.deploy:preview: source .env && yarn run vercel --env JWT_SECRET="$JWT_SECRET" --env DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN="$DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN" --env DISCORD_SERVER_ID="$DISCORD_SERVER_ID" --env DISCORD_ROLE_ID="$DISCORD_ROLE_ID" --env HASURA_ENDPOINT="$HASURA_ENDPOINT" --env HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET="$HASURA_ADMIN_SECRET" --env MORALIS_API_KEY="$MORALIS_API_KEY" --env COVALENTHQ_API_KEY="$COVALENTHQ_API_KEY" --env ALCHEMY_MAINNET_API_KEY="$ALCHEMY_MAINNET_API_KEY" --env ALCHEMY_RINKEBY_API_KEY="$ALCHEMY_RINKEBY_API_KEY"
scripts.typechain:build: yarn run typechain --target ethers-v5 --out-dir typechain abi/*.json abi/**/*.json
